DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate efficacy , safety , pharmacodynamic , pharmacokinetic immunogenic profile SA237 patient NMO NMOSD
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Monotherapy SA237 Treat NMO NMOSD
DOC.criteria: 1 . NMO NMOSD 2 . Age 18 74 year , inclusive time inform consent . 1 . Pregnancy lactation . 2 . Evidence demyelinate disease PML . 3 . Known active infection ( exclude fungal infection nail bed caries dentium ) within 4 week prior baseline .
